title: Vector 3 Reversal Function
description:
ISC_UPPER tests whether a sign IN is a captial letter, if IN is a capital let￾ter, the function returns TRUE, if not the function returns FALSE. In exami￾ning the Global Setup EXTENDED_ASCII constant is considered. If EXTEN￾DED_ASCII = TRUE the extended ASCII character-set to be considered in
accordance with ISO 8859-1.
The The following table describes the character codes:
Code EXTENDED_ASCII=TRUE EXTENDED_ASCII = FASLE
0..64,91..191,215, 223..255 FALSE FALSE
65..90 TRUE TRUE
192..214 TRUE FALSE
216..222 TRUE FALSE
name: V3_REV

input.name: A
input.description: The input vector whose components are to be reversed.

return_value.description: The output vector which is the negation of the input vector A.

fields.name: X
fields.description: The X component of the output vector, which is the negative of the X component of input vector A.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: The Y component of the output vector, which is the negative of the Y component of input vector A.

fields.name: Z
fields.description: The Z component of the output vector, which is the negative of the Z component of input vector A.
